mapper.sql: member_cnsl_seq, atch_file_seq, atch_file_gbn_type, atch_file_name, atch_file_path_text, atch_file_url
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.board.repository.master.BdMemberCounselAttachFileDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE bd_member_counsel_attach_file
member_cnsl_seq = #{memberCnslSeq, jdbcType=BIGINT},
atch_file_seq = #{atchFileSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
atch_file_gbn_type = #{atchFileGbnType, jdbcType=CHAR},
atch_file_name = #{atchFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
atch_file_path_text = #{atchFilePathText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
atch_file_url = #{atchFileUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE atch_file_seq = #{atchFileSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND member_cnsl_seq = #{memberCnslSeq, jdbcType=BIGINT}
